quote: She had found someone who matched her, a warrior and a shield. A man she could respect; one she could argue with and enjoy. She hadn't wanted to lose that. Hadn't wanted to be alone again.
quote_letters: SHE HAD FOUND SOMEONE WHO MATCHED HER A WARRIOR AND A SHIELD A MAN SHE COULD RESPECT ONE SHE COULD ARGUE WITH AND ENJOY SHE HADNT WANTED TO LOSE THAT HADNT WANTED TO BE ALONE AGAIN
